snippet: On Feb. 10, 1962, the Soviet Union released the captured American pilot Francis Gary Powers because the United States agreed to release Rudolph Ivanovich Abel, a Soviet spy.
abstract: On Feb. 10, 1962, the Soviet Union released the captured American pilot Francis Gary Powers because the United States agreed to release Rudolph Ivanovich Abel, a Soviet spy.

headline.main: Feb. 10, 1962 | U-2 Pilot Francis Gary Powers Released From Soviet Custody
